title: Playful Ornamented Serif
content:
Greetings!

Can anyone ID the serif used in "Once Upon a Giggle"?

My apologies for the low resolution image.

Thanks so much!

| --- | --- |

author: malbright

comments.content: **[BB Petie Boy (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415093052/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=&fid=8000f1b182b74ebb1cab096db14f36a7&fsize=48&text=ONCE%20UPON%20A%20GIGGLE&wrap=2)** public domain font by Jay Hilgert
